channel.title: travel on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in travel on 2D Steve

item.title: Our Nation's Capital
item.description: Hey everybody! My name is Stephen and I fail miserably at keeping this blog going for long periods of time.

item.title: Hangin' In Nawlins - Part 3
item.description: So it’s been a couple weeks since we actually returned from Nawlins, but I wanted to at least post a little about our trip because we had so much fun!

item.title: Hangin' in Nawlins Part 2
item.description: Here I am to continue my story from yesterday. I’m sure I’ll eventually get to the part where we hang out in Nawlins and I tell you what we did, but for now we’ll just finish up the trip on the airplane.

item.title: Hangin' in Nawlins
item.description: Steph and I have officially made it to New Orleans, Louisiana!
